SEARCH
Package view

Class GamePanelView

java.lang.Object
view.GamePanelView
public class GamePanelView extends Object
GamePanelView class is responsible for rendering the game board and its components. It initializes the game board, sets up the player icons, and handles user interactions.

  • Constructor Details

    • GamePanelView

      public GamePanelView(JungleKing jungleKing)
      Constructs the GamePanelView and initializes UI components for the guessing of piece.
      Parameters:
      jungleKing - The JungleKing instance that manages the game state.

  • Method Details

    • updateAllAnimalIcons

      public void updateAllAnimalIcons()
      Updates all animal icons on the board by redrawing all elements.

    • getMainPanel

      public JPanel getMainPanel()
      Returns the main panel containing the game board and player display.
      Returns:
      The main JPanel for the game that contains all panels.

    • setController

      public void setController(GamePanelController controller)
      Sets the controller for the game panel, allowing it to handle button clicks.
      Parameters:
      controller - The GamePanelController instance that handles user interactions.

    • updatePlayerDisplay

      public void updatePlayerDisplay(String text)
      Updates the player display with the current player's name.
      Parameters:
      text - The text to display for the current player.

    • highlightValidMoves

      public void highlightValidMoves(Piece piece)
      Highlights the valid moves for the given piece on the board.
      Parameters:
      piece - The piece for which valid moves are to be highlighted.

    • clearHighlights

      public void clearHighlights()
      Highlights the tile where the piece is currently located.

    • showWinner

      public void showWinner(String winnerName)
      Displays a popup message indicating the winner of the game.
      Parameters:
      winnerName - The name of the winning player.

    • showErrorMessage

      public void showErrorMessage(String message)
      Displays an error message indicating an invalid move.
      Parameters:
      message - The error message to display.
